issue.subject: Enhance "third party" validation screen
issue.description:
Here is the current screen for "third party validation" screen in FE.


!validation_before.png!

Here is our proposal to enhance the layout :

!validation.png!

The proposal is similar and consistent with other screens, like here : #958

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value: - add a "detail" button to open the request view

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: general review of the layout to be more consistent with other screens.

journals.notes:
Dear TC members, 

If possibly, please vote on this if you think there is no need to wait for next TC meeting.

Thanks.
